bibl.title: The Greek Pentateuch and the Scholarly Milieu of Alexandria.
bibl.note: Introduction. - A Return to the Letter of Aristeas. - Three recent theories on the origins of the LXX. - A scholarly milieu for the translation of the Pentateuch. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Fernández Marcos Natalio, The Greek Pentateuch and the Scholarly Milieu of Alexandria.
Introduction. - A Return to the Letter of Aristeas. - Three recent theories on the origins of the LXX. - A scholarly milieu for the translation of the Pentateuch. - Conclusions.
